plugins.name: GraalVM JavaScript Engine
plugins.description: GraalVM Polyglot JavaScript engine for Desktop - high-performance JS execution with full ES2022+ support

plugins.name: J2V8 JavaScript Engine
plugins.description: V8 JavaScript engine for Android - enables LNReader-compatible sources with full ES6+ support

plugins.name: AI Summarizer
plugins.description: AI-powered text summarization for novels. Supports chapter summaries, book overviews, 'previously on' recaps, and key point extraction using OpenAI or Claude APIs.

plugins.name: Bookmark Manager
plugins.description: Advanced bookmark management with tags, notes, and smart organization. Features include bookmark search, export/import, and reading progress tracking.

plugins.name: Chapter Notes
plugins.description: Take notes while reading chapters. Features include chapter summaries, character notes, plot points tracking, and markdown support.

plugins.name: FlareSolverr Bypass
plugins.description: Cloudflare bypass using FlareSolverr. Downloads the required files automatically on first use.

plugins.name: Quote Highlighter
plugins.description: Highlight and save memorable quotes while reading. Features include color-coded highlights, quote collections, and easy sharing to social media.

plugins.name: Reading Goals
plugins.description: Set and track your reading goals with daily, weekly, and monthly targets. Features streak tracking, progress visualization, and achievement badges.

plugins.name: Reading Statistics
plugins.description: Comprehensive reading statistics and analytics. Track reading time, pages read, reading speed, daily/weekly/monthly goals, and reading streaks.

plugins.name: Reading Timer
plugins.description: Track your reading time with session tracking, daily summaries, and focus mode. Includes Pomodoro technique support.

plugins.name: Reading Progress Tracker
plugins.description: Track and sync your reading progress across devices. Supports cloud backup, reading goals, and detailed analytics.

plugins.name: Smart Dictionary
plugins.description: Instant word definitions and translations while reading. Features vocabulary building, spaced repetition review, and offline caching.

plugins.name: Arctic Aurora
plugins.description: Northern lights inspired with teal and purple gradients

plugins.name: Coffee Bean
plugins.description: Rich coffee brown theme perfect for cozy reading sessions

plugins.name: Coral Reef
plugins.description: Tropical ocean colors with warm coral and cool cyan accents

plugins.name: Cyber Neon
plugins.description: Futuristic cyberpunk theme with electric cyan and magenta accents

plugins.name: Desert Sand
plugins.description: Warm earthy tones inspired by desert landscapes

plugins.name: Mint Fresh
plugins.description: Cool refreshing mint green theme for a clean reading experience

plugins.name: Nordic Frost
plugins.description: Cool icy blues with silver accents inspired by Scandinavian winters

plugins.name: Ocean Theme
plugins.description: A calming ocean-inspired theme with blue tones

plugins.name: Royal Velvet
plugins.description: Rich luxurious purple theme fit for royalty

plugins.name: Sakura Night
plugins.description: Japanese cherry blossom inspired theme with soft pinks and purples

plugins.name: Slate Gray
plugins.description: Professional minimal theme with elegant gray tones

plugins.name: Vintage Sepia
plugins.description: Classic old book feel with warm brown tones

plugins.name: DeepSeek Translation
plugins.description: AI-powered translation using DeepSeek API. Supports context-aware translation with style preservation for literary content.

plugins.name: Hugging Face Translation
plugins.description: Free AI translation using Hugging Face Inference API with Helsinki-NLP models. No API key required.

plugins.name: LibreTranslate
plugins.description: Free and open-source translation using LibreTranslate API. No API key required.

plugins.name: Ollama Translation
plugins.description: Local AI translation using Ollama. Run LLMs locally for private, offline translation. Requires Ollama server running.

plugins.name: OpenAI Translation
plugins.description: AI-powered translation using OpenAI GPT models. High-quality context-aware translation with style preservation.

plugins.name: Bark TTS (Gradio)
plugins.description: High-quality generative TTS by Suno. Supports multiple speaker presets.

plugins.name: Edge TTS (Gradio)
plugins.description: Microsoft Edge TTS with multiple voices via Gradio. High-quality neural voices for English and other languages.

plugins.name: Fish Speech (Gradio)
plugins.description: Fast multilingual TTS with natural prosody. Supports English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean. Updated with better voice quality.

plugins.name: OpenVoice (Gradio)
plugins.description: Voice cloning TTS with emotion control. Supports multiple styles like whispering, shouting, excited, and more.

plugins.name: Parler TTS (Gradio)
plugins.description: Describe the voice you want! Natural language voice description for TTS.

plugins.name: Persian TTS (Chatterbox - Natural)
plugins.description: High-quality Persian TTS using Chatterbox neural model - natural and expressive speech.

plugins.name: Persian TTS (Edge - Premium)
plugins.description: Premium Persian TTS using Microsoft Edge neural voices - most natural and realistic Persian speech.

plugins.name: Persian TTS (Piper - Basic)
plugins.description: Persian language TTS using Piper voices via Gradio (basic quality). Updated with improved stability.

plugins.name: Persian TTS (XTTS v2 - Voice Clone)
plugins.description: Persian TTS with XTTS v2 - supports voice cloning for personalized voices.

plugins.name: Silero TTS (Gradio)
plugins.description: Fast and lightweight TTS with multiple languages including English, German, Spanish, French, Russian, and more.

plugins.name: StyleTTS 2 (Gradio)
plugins.description: High-quality expressive TTS with style control. Adjust alpha, beta, and diffusion steps.

plugins.name: Tortoise TTS (Gradio)
plugins.description: High-quality TTS with many voice options. Slower but produces excellent results.

plugins.name: XTTS v2 (Gradio)
plugins.description: Coqui's latest multilingual TTS with voice cloning support. 15+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, and more.

plugins.name: Piper TTS
plugins.description: High-performance neural text-to-speech with 30+ voices in 20+ languages. Uses standalone Piper executable.
